Conjuration 2

Summon Storm Power
Combat
A1
spell id [id]: 719
effect number [effect_number]: 23
damage [damage]: 8192
spec [spec]: 16384
casting time [casttime]: 100%
area of effect [aoe_s]: Caster
number of effects [nreff]: 1
fatigue cost [fatiguecost]: 10-
Bless/Buff: Storm Power
 
(Ignores Shields [ignoreshield])
During a storm, this spell can be used to channel the power of the storm through the mage. This enables the mage to cast more powerful Air magic spells. This spell only works during a storm.
Grants Air magic bonus +1.
